forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle clarity graces Downtown San Francisco this morning, painting the city in an inviting light. With sunny accents throughout the day, expect the temperatures to hover pleasantly around 67 degrees in the morning, easing into a comfortable 65 come afternoon. The soft caress of a southwest breeze dances through the streets, stirring the air with refreshing gusts that flirt with 18 mph, adding a vibrant touch to the sun-drenched scene. Fog, typically a companion here, seems to be holding back for now, leaving a crisp blue backdrop that encourages exploration.

As twilight approaches, the temperature will slide down to a cozy 55, cloaked in partly cloudy skies. For comfort, a light jacket or a shawl would serve well against the evening chill. Today beckons you to stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps stopping for a quiet coffee at a cozy café or indulging in a leisurely read at one of the lush parks. These are the kind of subtleties that make a day like today bee lined for enjoyment, where any mundane activity becomes a canvas for a simple yet profound experience of the city.
